price: Pero si te desmienten, diles: "Dios bien sabe lo que hacen".
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
